subject: simulator seq shifter stock
description_text:
Hello,
I would like to ask if the Simulator Sequential Shifter will be restocked in
the near future.
Do you have an estimated date when it will be available again?

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jakubfabos,  We have already optimized and tested the sequence file, but adding support for the VAM vibration module may require some additional time.Â
